info.title: ARP Digital GPS API
info.description:
API for ARP Digital GPS platform allowing users to manage recipients, quotes, and remittance transactions.

## Authentication
All API requests require API Key authentication via the Authorization header.

Signature.name: X-Signature
Signature.description: HMAC SHA256 signature generated using the request payload and secret key.

Environment.name: X-Environment
Environment.description: Specifies the environment to use. Determines which database the API interacts with.

qrCode.description: Base64 encoded QR code image of the deposit address

routingNumber.description: Routing or sort code of the bank

referenceId.description: Reference ID for the deposit request
Optional reference ID for the deposit request. If not provided, a random string will be generated.

verificationInfo.description: Verification information, varies by country and type

fieldName.description: The field name to be used when submitting the data

type.description: The type of input field required. If type is 'FILE', you must include a file upload with the same name as the fieldName when creating a recipient.

value.description: The actual value to be submitted

options.description: Available options for MULTI_CHOICE type fields

type.description: Type of recipient - individual person or business entity

verificationInfo.description: Verification information, varies by country and type. This must be an object, not an array.

type.description: Payment method type (e.g., BANK_ACCOUNT). Common values include BANK_ACCOUNT, CASH_PICKUP, etc.

metadata.description: Payment method details specific to the type (e.g., for BANK_ACCOUNT: bankName, accountNumber, accountHolderName, etc.)

paymentMethods.description: Array with exactly one payment method

CreateRecipient.description: Recipient creation payload. Note: File upload functionality is temporarily disabled.

type.description: Type of recipient - individual person or business entity

verificationInfo.description: Verification information, varies by country and type

metadata.description: Payment method details specific to the type

paymentMethods.description: Array with exactly one payment method

toAmount.description: Target amount to receive (optional, alternative to fromAmount)

QuoteRequest.description: Request for a currency exchange quote

quoteId.description: ID of the quote to execute

secret.description: Secret key for webhook signature verification

isActive.description: Whether the webhook is currently active

url.description: The webhook endpoint URL that will receive event notifications

WebhookPayload.description: Webhook payload sent to configured webhook endpoints

event.description: The type of event that triggered this webhook

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the webhook was sent

webhook_id.description: ID of the webhook configuration that sent this payload

TransactionWebhookData.description: Transaction data sent in webhook payloads

fromAmount.description: Amount being sent (as string to preserve precision)

toAmount.description: Amount being received (as string to preserve precision)

notes.description: Additional notes (typically error messages for failed transactions)

completedAt.description: Timestamp when transaction was completed (only for completed transactions)

RecipientWebhookData.description: Recipient data sent in webhook payloads

newPassword.description: New password (must be at least 8 characters)
